file_insights.purpose: Create a suggestions registry for error remediation with context-aware suggestions
Likely to contain tests for the suggestions registry

patterns_discovered: Conditional suggestion registration based on OS, backend, architecture
Flexible suggestion registry with multiple registration methods
Global default registry with built-in suggestions
gotchas_discovered: Complex error suggestion logic with multiple condition matching
Need to handle different platform-specific suggestions
Potential performance overhead with priority sorting
Requires careful management of suggestion conditions

approach_outcome.description: Created a comprehensive error suggestions registry with context-aware remediation
key_achievements: Added platform and backend-specific suggestion support
Created utilities for context detection and merging
Established a global default registry with built-in suggestions

recommendations: Add comprehensive unit tests for suggestion matching and registration
Consider performance optimization for large numbers of suggestions
Implement a mechanism to dynamically load or update suggestions
Create documentation explaining the suggestion system's capabilities
Add logging or telemetry to track suggestion usage and effectiveness
